acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was a gift of Robert M. Dewey, 2007

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: A one volume VMI scrapbook compiled by Cadet Franklin H. Dewey, Class of 1929, covering the period 1926-1929. It contains candid photographs of cadet life, classmates, buildings, athletics; and memorabilia such as programs, clippings, and misc. documents. The contents provide insight into VMI student life in the late 1920's.
